section.desc: Display options control the display of optional parts of the interface. A '1' on the attribute @value will cause the item to be display in all places where it might occur, while '0' will not show it at all. Other values, which can be a comma-separated list of targets, point to either an item in 'contexts', that defines the target, or to a category in the tls-taxonomy for texts.
